Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Web.Mobile.dll assembly has been deprecated and should no longer be used. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=157231.")

summary.span: Defines an interface for a page designer component to obtain services from a designer host such as Visual Studio 2005 at design time.

span.span: Defines an interface for a page designer component to obtain services from a designer host such as Visual Studio 2005 at design time.

summary.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET.

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Todos os métodos nessa interface devem ser implementadas pelo host de design e disponibilizado para os componentes do designer nesta interface.All methods in this interface are to be implemented by the design host and made available to designer components through this interface. Antes de tentar usar os métodos em um componente de designer personalizado, verifique se que o host de design, na verdade, implementa a interface.Before attempting to use the methods in a custom designer component, verify that the design host actually implements the interface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Desde o método é implementado pelo host do designer, verifique se ele existe antes de invocá-lo.Since the method is implemented by the designer host, verify that it exists before invoking it.
